attributes.action: Give an honour to Michael Mabbs ,Leatherhead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Michael Mabbs, devoted time and courage into the country through out his life, serving in Kenya and has an epic history. 

In his eighties he is still ploughing on keeping up with correspondences and keenly researching family history.   


Could say more but would look like boasting about him,

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
